sn51.15:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
sn51.15:1.3: Atha kho unnabho brahmano yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi.
sn51.15:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho unnabho brahmano ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn51.15:1.5: “kimatthiyam nu kho, bho ananda, samane gotame brahmacariyam vussati”ti?
sn51.15:2.1: “Atthi pana, bho ananda, maggo atthi patipada etassa chandassa pahanaya”ti?
sn51.15:2.2: “Atthi kho, brahmana, maggo, atthi patipada etassa chandassa pahanaya”ti.
sn51.15:3.1: “Katamo pana, bho ananda, maggo katama patipada etassa chandassa pahanaya”ti?
sn51.15:3.6: ayam kho, brahmana, maggo ayam patipada etassa chandassa pahanaya”ti.
sn51.15:4.1: “Evam sante, bho ananda, santakam hoti no asantakam.
sn51.15:4.3: “Tena hi, brahmana, tannevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha tam byakareyyasi.
sn51.15:4.6: Tassa te aramagatassa yo tajjo chando so patippassaddho”ti?
sn51.15:4.9: Tassa te aramagatassa yam tajjam viriyam tam patippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:4.12: Tassa te aramagatassa yam tajjam cittam tam patippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:4.15: Tassa te aramagatassa ya tajja vimamsa sa patippassaddha”ti?
sn51.15:5.1: “Evameva kho, brahmana, yo so bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto, tassa yo pubbe chando ahosi arahattappattiya, arahattappatte yo tajjo chando so patippassaddho;
sn51.15:5.2: yam pubbe viriyam ahosi arahattappattiya, arahattappatte yam tajjam viriyam tam patippassaddham;
sn51.15:5.3: yam pubbe cittam ahosi arahattappattiya, arahattappatte yam tajjam cittam tam patippassaddham;
sn51.15:5.4: ya pubbe vimamsa ahosi arahattappattiya, arahattappatte ya tajja vimamsa sa patippassaddha.
sn51.15:5.6: iti evam sante, santakam va hoti no asantakam va”ti?
sn51.15:6.1: “Addha, bho ananda, evam sante, santakam hoti no asantakam.
sn51.15:6.2: Abhikkantam, bho ananda, abhikkantam, bho ananda.
sn51.15:6.3: Seyyathapi, bho ananda, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota anandena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn51.15:6.4: Esaham, bho ananda, tam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn51.15:6.5: Upasakam mam bhavam anando dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
